articles.description: The Big Bang theory proposes that a tiny speck of matter and energy began to grow, bringing about the birth of our universe about the universe billions of years ago.
articles.content:
There was absolutely nothing before the Big Bang, according to British physicist Stephen Hawking, who explained what happened prior to the existence of our universe.

articles.title: Elon Musk releases blooper reel of failed SpaceX rocket landings and huge explosions - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Titled ‘how NOT to land an orbital rocket booster’, the video is described as showing “the sordid history of how the SpaceX Falcon 9, the first fully reusable, orbit-class booster rocket”.
articles.content:
SpaceX CEO Elon Musk has released video of bloopers that show his companys rockets exploding over land and sea.

articles.title: UAE announces 100-year plan to finish building ‘first city on Mars’ by 2117 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The United Arab Emirates (UAE) will build the first city on the Red Planet as part of the 2117 Mars project in collaboration with specialised international organisations and scientific institutes.

articles.title: In pics: Supermoon brightens up skies, two more to be witnessed in Jan 2018 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Sunday’s supermoon is one in a three-part series, according to NASA. Another supermoon sighting is expected on January 1 and January 31, 2018.
articles.content:
Stargazers were in for a treat on Sunday as they caught a glimpse of the so-called supermoon when the Moon appeared bigger and brighter in the sky as it moved closer to Earth.
